description: T(2n,n), array T as in A054120.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = A069835(n) - A069835(n-1).G.f.: (1-x)/sqrt(1-8*x+4*x^2). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 13 2003Recurrence: (n-1)*n*a(n) = 4*(n-1)*(2*n-1)*a(n-1) - 4*(n-2)*n*a(n-2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 09 2012a(n) ~ sqrt(6+4*sqrt(3))*(4+2*sqrt(3))^n/(4*sqrt(Pi*n)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 09 2012Conjecture: n*a(n) +3*(-3*n+2)*a(n-1) +12*(n-2)*a(n-2) +4*(-n+3)*a(n-3)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 13 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
